description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguards</style></link>, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us." - The Vanguard's Code
name: Reinforcements
